wiki.summary: "Lose You to Love Me" is about realizing that a romantic relationship had to end in order for her to realize her self-worth and find love within herself. The song highlights the healing process that follows a tough breakup, and reflects on all the red flags that were ignored during the relationship. It conveys the idea that sometimes we need to lose the one we love in order to truly love ourselves. Gomez emphasizes the need to accept that her love was not properly reciprocated and coming to terms with the fact that she needs to move on. Read more on Last.fm.
